name: obsidian-sample-plugin
description: This is a sample plugin for Obsidian (https://obsidian.md)

scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
scripts.dev-pack: tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs && cp main.js ical-obsidian-sync && cp manifest.json ical-obsidian-sync && cp styles.css  ical-obsidian-sync && cp .noun_patterns.txt ical-obsidian-sync && cp .proper_name_patterns.txt ical-obsidian-sync && cp .googleOAuthCredentials.json ical-obsidian-sync && cp main.js.map ical-obsidian-sync
scripts.dev: npm run dev-pack && cp -r ical-obsidian-sync /Users/lorenzovaccarini/Library/Mobile\ Documents/iCloud~md~obsidian/Documents/Obsidian\ Vault/.obsidian/plugins
scripts.prod-pack: tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs prod && cp main.js ical-obsidian-sync && cp manifest.json ical-obsidian-sync && cp styles.css  ical-obsidian-sync && cp .noun_patterns.txt ical-obsidian-sync && cp .proper_name_patterns.txt ical-obsidian-sync && cp .googleOAuthCredentials.json ical-obsidian-sync && cp main.js.map ical-obsidian-sync
scripts.prod: npm run prod-pack && cp -r ical-obsidian-sync /Users/lorenzovaccarini/Library/Mobile\ Documents/iCloud~md~obsidian/Documents/Obsidian\ Vault/.obsidian/plugins
